item.title: W8-§1 Improper Integrals
item.description: 周次: 8 备注: Attendance check 日期: April 13, 2022 节次: 1 In this lecture, we consider integrals when the domain of integration is infinite, or the range of the integrand is infinite. Such cases are not Riemann integrable, therefore, they are called improper integrals. We would like to manage the integrations for these cases, via some limit procedure. Outline Improper Integrals of
